overview:
Roberto Pinia has since the age of 17 held different positions within Consultancy and Business Development in the Schibsted Group.

He has, as one of the youngest people in the company, been responsible for managing strategy and business projects of high technical complexity, such as development of web applications and mobile services â€” as well as several other joint ventures in Northern Europe. He has also been a key participant of several ongoing mobile strategy initiatives for international clients, providing consultancy on technology and how to monetize the mobile medium.

He is currently pursuing an LL.M. degree (Master of Laws) at The Faculty of Law in Oslo.
